Actions.Description: This operation triggers when a checklist instance is started.

Actions.Description: This operation triggers when a checklist step is completed.

Actions.Description: Retrieve all activity for a checklist instance

Actions.Description: Creates a new activated checklist instance.

Actions.Description: Mark a specific step in a checklist instance as complete.

Actions.Description: Adds a new comment to an Activated Checklist Instance step.

Actions.Name: Find Checklist
Actions.Description: Search for a checklist by title

Actions.Description: Search for a checklist instance by title.

Actions.Description: Find a step of a checklist instance

Actions.Name: Find User
Actions.Description: Search for a user by name or email.

Actions.Name: When a checklist is finished
Actions.Description: This operation triggers when a checklist is finished.

Actions.Description: This operation triggers when a procedure is accepted.

Actions.Description: This operation triggers when a new comment is added to a checklist.
